snippet: In his second inaugural address, the governor of New York touched on some of the high points while laying out an ambitious agenda.
abstract: Editorial analyzes ambitious second inaugural address by New York Gov Andrew Cuomo, speech that went largely unnoticed amid death of his father, former Gov Mario Cuomo; notes speech centered on problems facing both New York and America as a whole, possibly signalling national political ambitions on Cuomo's part.
lead_paragraph: In his second inaugural address, the governor of New York touched on some of the high points while laying out an ambitious agenda.
